scripts.install-pattern-lab-twig: if [ ! -d pattern-lab ]; then composer create-project -n pattern-lab/edition-twig-standard pattern-lab && cd pattern-lab && composer require aleksip/plugin-data-transform && php core/console -c --set sourceDir=../source && php core/console -c --set twigAutoescape=0 && php core/console --generate && cd ..; fi
scripts.install-pattern-lab-tpl: if [ ! -d pattern-lab ]; then composer create-project -n aleksip/edition-php-tpl pattern-lab && cd pattern-lab && php core/console -c --set sourceDir=../source && php core/console --generate && cd ..; fi
